name: collectionbuilder-gh-data
title: CollectionBuilder-GH Data
description: Metadata and data derived from CollectionBuilder-GH. CollectionBuilder-GH is a template for creating small digital collection exhibits on GitHub Pages designed for teaching digital library skills

resources.title: CollectionBuilder-GH Metadata Facets
resources.description: Unique values and counts of metadata facet fields.

resources.title: CollectionBuilder-GH metadata subject counts in csv

resources.name: geodata-json

resources.description: Geojson data containing all objects with lat-longs and associated descriptive metadata.

resources.description: Time-based metadata formatted for TimelineJS or other applications.
